home.title: Felipe Delfim
home.subtitle: Fullstack Developer
home.description: Computer Engineer graduated from Federal University of Ouro Preto (UFOP), I am passionate about technology and creating new things. I currently work as a fullstack developer, with Vue.js and Node.js.

items.title: FlexiFile
items.subtitle: File Converter
items.description: System developed to convert files to different formats. Developed with NextJS, Flask-API, Redis Upstash. API hosted on Oracle Cloud and Frontend on Vercel.

items.title: QR Leitos
items.subtitle: Hospital bed monitoring application
items.description: Project developed at UFOP and awarded at the II Knowledge Week of João Monlevade/MG. The project includes a Mobile application developed with React Native and a WEB application developed with React. Currently, the project is in the implementation phase, with pilot sector tests being conducted.

items.title: Rs-sp
items.subtitle: Psychological resilience scale in sports
items.description: Project developed as part of my Final Course Work. It is a system for data collection and classification of users in terms of psychological resilience in sports.

items.title: Portfolio
items.subtitle: My portfolio
items.description: This project is my personal portfolio, developed with NextJS and TailwindCSS.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and key achievements over the years

items.description: Development and maintenance of web systems for economic and financial data analysis.

Integration with tools such as GA4 and Google Analytics for data analysis

Maintenance and performance improvements to ensure system stability

Creation of automated tests to ensure code quality

items.description: Development and maintenance of web system for Sicoob Credimepi.
